settings.heading: Why Estrogel?
settings.description: Estrogel is a trusted estrogen gel used by women worldwide. Learn why it's considered the first-line treatment option.

settings.title: Global Leader
settings.description: First-line treatment choice in the UK and worldwide
settings.icon_svg: <svg width="28" height="28" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M3.055 11H5a2 2 0 012 2v1a2 2 0 002 2 2 2 0 012 2v2.945M8 3.935V5.5A2.5 2.5 0 0010.5 8h.5a2 2 0 012 2 2 2 0 104 0 2 2 0 012-2h1.064M15 20.488V18a2 2 0 012-2h3.064M21 12a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z"/></svg>

settings.title: Easy Application
settings.description: Simple gel that absorbs quickly into the skin
settings.icon_svg: <svg width="28" height="28" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 21a4 4 0 01-4-4V5a2 2 0 012-2h4a2 2 0 012 2v12a4 4 0 01-4 4zm0 0h12a2 2 0 002-2v-4a2 2 0 00-2-2h-2.343M11 7.343l1.657-1.657a2 2 0 012.828 0l2.829 2.829a2 2 0 010 2.828l-8.486 8.485M7 17h.01"/></svg>

settings.title: Flexible Dosing
settings.description: Adjustable dosing to meet individual needs
settings.icon_svg: <svg width="28" height="28" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M12 8v4l3 3m6-3a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z"/></svg>

settings.title: Fully Funded
settings.description: Available and fully funded in New Zealand
settings.icon_svg: <svg width="28" height="28" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M9 12l2 2 4-4m6 2a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z"/></svg>

settings.info_text: Estrogel is used for hormone replacement therapy (HRT) in women experiencing menopausal symptoms due to estrogen deficiency. It helps relieve symptoms such as hot flushes, night sweats, vaginal dryness, and mood changes.
settings.disclaimer_text: EstrogelÂ® (estradiol) is a prescription medicine used for the relief of menopausal symptoms associated with estrogen deficiency. Always read the label and use as directed. If symptoms persist, see your healthcare professional. TAPS Approval No: [To be added]
